# The `IRBuilderDefaultInserter` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This provides the default implementation of the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilder">IRBuilder</a> &#39;InsertHelper&#39; method that is called whenever an instruction is created by <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilder">IRBuilder</a> and needs to be inserted. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

This provides the default implementation of the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilder">IRBuilder</a> &#39;InsertHelper&#39; method that is called whenever an instruction is created by <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilder">IRBuilder</a> and needs to be inserted.

By default, this inserts the instruction at the insertion point.

Definition at line 60 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/irbuilder-h">IRBuilder.h</a>.
